id.description: The global unique identifier of a flight (gufi).

geometry.description: The latest position of the flight.

type.description: The type geometry for flight positions, default as point.

coordinates.description: The latitude/longtitude components of the flight position.

airline.description: The ICAO identification of the carrier who is operating the flight, e.g. EZY.

callsign.description: The defined callsign of this flight (Airline code/Flight number - AA1234).

flightStatus.description: The status of a flight as per the available options: PLANNED, SCHEDULED, AIRBORNE, COMPLETED, CANCELLED.

iataFlightNumber.description: The letter/number combination you are likely to see on airport screens and your ticket.

timestampProcessed.description: The time at which the flight message is processed by snowflake software, present in UTC format.

departure.description: Information related to the departure of the flight,

aerodrome.description: The ICAO code of the aerodrome.

actual.description: The ICAO code of the actual departure/arrival aerodrome.

scheduled.description: The ICAO code of the scheduled departure/arrival aerodrome.

gateTime.description: For departure, this is pushing back time/off-block time; for arrival, this is on-block time.

estimated.description: For departure, this is estimated off-block time; for arrival, this is estimated on-block time, present in UTC format.

runwayTime.description: For departure, this is the time when the aircraft takes off from the runway; for arrival, this is the time when the aircraft touches the runway.

actual.description: The actual departure/arrival time of the flight in UTC format.

estimated.description: The estimated departure/arrival time of the flight in UTC format.

initial.description: The initial departure/arrival time of the flight, available before the flight took off, present in UTC format.

arrival.description: Information related to the arrival of the flight,

aerodrome.description: The ICAO code of the aerodrome.

scheduled.description: The ICAO code for the  scheduled departure/arrival aerodrome.

initial.description: The ICAO code for the departure/arrival aerodrome before the flight took off.

runwayTime.description: For departure, this is the time when the aircraft takes off from the runway; for arrival, this is the time when the aircraft touches the runway.

actual.description: The actual departure/arrival time of the flight in UTC format.

initial.description: The initial departure/arrival time of the flight, available before the flight took off, present in UTC format.

estimated.description: The estimated departure/arrival time of the flight in UTC format.

positionReport.description: Information related to the lastest position of the flight.

source.description: The name of the source of this data.

track.description: The direction the Flight is heading in. The value should be provided in degrees.

altitude.description: The altitude of a Flight. The value should be provided in feet.

captureTimestamp.description: The time at which the flight position is captured, present in UTC format.
